TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyGeneratedEventHandler(object sender, PropertyGeneratedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyGeneratedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PropertyGeneratedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As PropertyGeneratedEventArgs)
public delegate void PropertyGeneratedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, PropertyGeneratedEventArgs ^ e);
type PropertyGeneratedEventHandler = delegate of obj * PropertyGeneratedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
